resources.string:
In this application,you can now
Explore natural diversity interactively.
Take a photo of your surroundings,
Insert an image, and let the appreveal
The mysteries of nature.
Capture an image from your gallery and discover the results of the captured picture.
take a picture through the camera, and see the result of the picture

Welcome to Wild Nest, fellow hikers!
This app is specially designed to help
you detect poisonous plants around you.
Let's explore and understand the diversity
of flora more safely together.
